text: Ara yakhana ib‌rahima balala, ‘he amara raba! Kibhabe apani mrta ke jibita karena dekhana’, tini balalena, ‘tabe ki apani imana anena ni?’ Tini balalena, ‘abasya'i hyam, kintu amara mana yate prasanta haya [1]! Allah‌ balalena, ‘tabe carati pakhi nina ebam taderake apanara basibhuta karuna. Tarapara segulora tukaro ansa eka eka pahare sthapana karuna. Tarapara seguloke dakuna, segulo apanara nikata daure asabe. Ara jene rakhuna, niscaya'i allah‌ prabala parakramasali, prajnamaya
